sentence.Network_en: Neil's colleagues say he was actually in a joking, upbeat mood.
sentence.Network_cn: 内尔的同事们说他实际上在说笑逗乐，心情不错。

sentence.Network_en: Scientists remain upbeat about the information that will be gathered.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家对即将收集到的信息仍满怀希望。

sentence.Network_en: The Defense Secretary gave an upbeat assessment of the war so far.
sentence.Network_cn: 国防部长对目前的战事给予了乐观的评价。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... thrive v. 兴旺，繁荣，茁壮成长 upbeat a. 乐观的，快乐的 virtually ad. 几乎.
《Friends》词汇表A ... yet adv. 仍, 至今, 益发, 更 upbeat n. [音]弱拍, 上升, 兴旺 surprisingly surprisinglyadv. 令人惊讶地.
129.快速打腿：sprinting kick130.向上打腿：upbeat131.向下打腿：downbeat
Bryant appeared upbeat when he spoke to reporters before the game ., 在比赛之前 , 科比对记者说的时候似乎很乐观.

list.abs: it contrasted with other evidence a bigger expansion , as more upbeat business surveys and improving conditions in the labour market .这跟其他证明经济增长的证据相反，比如更加乐观的经济调查和条件改善了的劳动力市场。
We ' re actually really upbeat people ., 事实上我们都是相当积极的人.
This makes we cannot hold upbeat mood to move of power of agricultural surplus labor ., 这使我们无法对农业剩余劳动力转移持乐观态度.
with this upbeat mood you should be very confident for the Silverstone weekend . are you ?问：带着这种乐观的心情，你应当对本周末的银石比赛很有信心了，是不是？
my mother is an upbeat woman ., 我的妈妈是一个乐观的女人.

entry.tran: 达观的；乐观的；充满希望的
entry.def: If people or their opinions are upbeat, they are cheerful and hopeful about a situation.

example.ex: The Defense Secretary gave an upbeat assessment of the war so far...
example.tran: 国防部长对目前的战事给予了乐观的评价。

example.ex: Neil's colleagues say he was actually in a joking, upbeat mood...
example.tran: 内尔的同事们说他实际上在说笑逗乐，心情不错。

entry.def: In music, the upbeat is the beat before the first beat of the bar.

means.word_mean: 1. a contented state of being happy and healthy and prosperous;

sentences.sentence: "the town was finally on the upbeat after our recent troubles"

means.word_mean: 2. an unaccented beat (especially the last beat of a measure)
